data.taskTitle: /source > source control > git > changes > stage file button :: does not stage renamed files
/source > source control > git > changes > stage file button :: does not stage renamed files
data.approach: Fix renamed file staging by passing both the old (from) and new (to) paths to git add. Currently only the new path is passed, which fails to stage the rename properly.

data.taskTitle: /source > source control > git > changes > stage file button :: does not stage renamed files
summary: Added stageRename() function that passes both from and to paths to git add
Updated rename staging button to call stageRename(renamed) instead of stageFile(renamed.to)
Updated stageAll() to include both paths for renamed files using flatMap
reviewFocus: Verify renamed files now stage correctly by testing in the IDE

summary: Fixed staging mechanism for renamed files in Git panel
Audited file staging behavior across different file types
Updated handling of file changes in version control interface

suggestedTasks.title: Implement Comprehensive Git File Staging Unit Tests
suggestedTasks.description: Create a comprehensive test suite for file staging scenarios in the Git panel. This should cover renamed files, new files, modified files, and edge cases in file staging. Focus on creating tests that validate the staging mechanism across different file types and rename operations.
suggestedTasks.reason: Ensure robust file staging behavior across all scenarios

suggestedTasks.title: Document Git Panel File Staging Behavior
suggestedTasks.description: Create clear documentation explaining the file staging mechanism in the Git panel. Include details about how different file types are handled, potential edge cases, and the expected behavior for renamed, new, and modified files.
suggestedTasks.reason: Improve developer understanding of version control interactions

patterns: Careful handling of file state in version control interactions
Robust error checking for file staging operations
gotchas: Some file types may require special handling during staging
Rename operations can introduce unexpected staging behaviors

documentationNeeds: Update Git panel file staging documentation
Add explanatory comments in file staging implementation
